00012 CalibrationWriter::CalibrationWriter(std::string dbinit, std::string folder, std::string description):
00013   _dbinit(dbinit), _folder(folder), _description(description)
00014 {
00015 
00016   _writeMap.clear();
00017

00022 CalibrationWriter::~CalibrationWriter() {
00023 
00024   for (CalibrationWriteMap::iterator _mapIter=_writeMap.begin(); _mapIter != _writeMap.end(); _mapIter++){
00025     delete _mapIter->second;
00026   }  
00027   _writeMap.clear();
00028 }

00032 void CalibrationWriter::putCalibration(unsigned moduleID, unsigned chip, unsigned channel, LCHcalCalibrationObject* Calibration) {
00033 
00034   putCalibration(moduleID, (chip << 8) + channel, Calibration);
00035 }
00036

00038 
00039 void CalibrationWriter::putCalibration(unsigned moduleID, unsigned cellKey, LCHcalCalibrationObject* Calibration) {
00040 
00041   lcio::LCCollectionVec* _col;
00042 //  std::cout << "putCalibration: " << moduleID << " " << cellKey << std::endl;
00043   CalibrationWriteMap::iterator _mapIter = _writeMap.find(moduleID);
00044   if (_mapIter == _writeMap.end()) {
00045 //    std::cout << "new collection" << std::endl;
00046     _col = new lcio::LCCollectionVec(LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT);
00047     _col->parameters().setValue("ModuleID",(int) moduleID);
00048     _writeMap.insert(std::make_pair(moduleID,_col));    
00049   } else {
00050 //    std::cout << "old collection used" << std::endl;
00051     _col = _mapIter->second;
00052   }  
00053   _col->addElement(Calibration);
00054 
00055 }
00056

00058 void CalibrationWriter::flushCalibration(lccd::LCCDTimeStamp from, lccd::LCCDTimeStamp till, bool _writeFile) const {
00059   
00060   flushCalibration(from, till, from, till, _writeFile);
00061 }

00064 void CalibrationWriter::flushCalibration(lccd::LCCDTimeStamp from, lccd::LCCDTimeStamp till, lccd::LCCDTimeStamp extractionTime, bool _writeFile) const {
00065   
00066   flushCalibration(from, till, extractionTime, extractionTime, _writeFile);
00067 }
00068   
00069   
00070 void CalibrationWriter::flushCalibration(lccd::LCCDTimeStamp from, lccd::LCCDTimeStamp till, lccd::LCCDTimeStamp extractionFrom, lccd::LCCDTimeStamp extractionTill, bool _writeFile) const {
00071 
00072   for (CalibrationWriteMap::const_iterator _mapIter = _writeMap.begin(); _mapIter != _writeMap.end(); _mapIter++) {
00073     unsigned _moduleID = _mapIter->first;
00074 //     std::cout <<"CalibrationWriter: moduleID="<< std::hex << _moduleID << std::dec << std::endl;
00075 
00076     bool tcmtFlag = false;
00077     if( (_moduleID&0xFFFF)==0 ) tcmtFlag=true;
00078 
00079     lcio::LCCollectionVec* _col = _mapIter->second;
00080     _col->parameters().setValue("ExtractionTimeFromL",(int)(extractionFrom >> 32));
00081     _col->parameters().setValue("ExtractionTimeFromH",(int)(extractionFrom & 0x00000000FFFFFFFF));
00082     _col->parameters().setValue("ExtractionTimeTillL",(int)(extractionTill >> 32));
00083     _col->parameters().setValue("ExtractionTimeTillH",(int)(extractionTill & 0x00000000FFFFFFFF));
00084     lccd::DBInterface* _db = NULL;
00085 
00086     char _mod[10];
00087     sprintf(_mod,"%.2d",(_moduleID >> 8));
00088     std::string _moduleString(_mod);
00089     if(!tcmtFlag) {
00090       // here for Hcal
00091       int mtype = (_moduleID & 0xFF);
00092       std::string _moduleExt((mtype%2==0) ? "A" : "B");
00093       _db = new lccd::DBInterface(_dbinit, _folder+"/ID"+_moduleString+_moduleExt, true);
00094       _db->storeCollection(from, till, _col, _description+" for module "+_moduleString);
00095     }
00096     else {
00097       // here for TCMT
00098       _db = new lccd::DBInterface(_dbinit, _folder+_moduleString, true);
00099       _db->storeCollection(from, till, _col, _description);
00100     }
00101 
00102     if (_db && _writeFile) {
00103       _db->createDBFile();
00104       delete _db;
00105     }
00106   }
00107 
00108 }
00109   
00110 }
